title: saagaruNDu veDaley
sahitya:
sAgaruNDu veDale nidO sAreku gana rArE

anupallavi

 bAguga prahlAduni vara yOgini kaugida jErci

caraNam 1

 mandara dharuDAnanda kandudu tana hrdayAra vindambuna nelakonna saundaryamulanu dalacucu
   
caraNam 2

 varanamulapai bhEri vAdyambulu mrOyaga sura vAra nATyapu varusala jUcucu vETkaga
   
caraNam 3

 ranjillani shrI tyAgarAja sakhuni manasAra pUjincu nuNDu tanuja rAjakumAra sahituDai
